```{r}
# load("3_stan.Rdata")
# save.image("3_stan.Rdata")
library(tidyverse)
library(rstan)
library(tidybayes)
options(mc.cores = parallel::detectCores())
rstan_options(auto_write = TRUE)
source("R/stan.R")

pars <- read_rds("data-simulated/1_pars.rds")
results <- 
    read_rds("data-simulated/1_results.rds") %>% 
    select(-item_10)
```

# fit model

```{r}
stan_data <- 
    select(starts_with("item")) %>% 
    irt_data_wide_to_long() %>% 
    irt_data_long_to_stan_list()

stan_model <- 
    stan(
        file = "stan/2pl.stan",
        data = stan_data,
        seed = 1,
        chains = 4,
        iter = 2000,
        save_dso = TRUE
    )

get_variables(stan_model)
```

# look at items

```{r}
items <- 
    stan_model %>% 
    recover_types() %>% 
    spread_draws(alpha[item], beta[item])

items %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = alpha)) +
    geom_histogram() +
    facet_wrap(~ item, scales = "free") +
    geom_vline(data = pars, aes(xintercept = a1), color = "blue")

items %>% 
    summarize(alpha = mean(alpha), beta = mean(beta)) %>% 
    left_join(pars)
```

correlations

```{r}
lowerFn <- function(data, mapping, method = "lm", ...) {
  ggplot(data = data, mapping = mapping) +
    geom_point(alpha = 0.01) +
    geom_smooth(method = method, color = "blue", ...)
}

# beta 
items %>% 
    ungroup() %>% 
    select(item, .draw, beta) %>% 
    spread(item, beta) %>% 
    select(-.draw) %>% 
    GGally::ggpairs(lower = list(continuous = GGally::wrap(lowerFn)))

# alpha
items %>% 
    ungroup() %>% 
    select(item, .draw, alpha) %>% 
    spread(item, alpha) %>% 
    select(-.draw) %>% 
    GGally::ggpairs(lower = list(continuous = GGally::wrap(lowerFn)))
```

# look at students

```{r}
# stan_model %>% recover_types() %>% spread_draws(theta[1])

persons <- 
    stan_model %>% 
    recover_types() %>% 
    spread_draws(theta[person])

persons %>% 
    filter(person %in% 1:10) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = theta)) +
    geom_histogram() +
    facet_wrap(~ person, scales = "free") +
    geom_vline(
        data = 
            results %>% 
            slice(1:10) %>% 
            mutate(person = row_number()) , 
        aes(xintercept = theta_1to9), 
        color = "blue"
    )
```
